name: Retro Chess
description:
Retro Chess is a quite fast puzzle platformer with yet only 3 levels.  It is the protoype of a student project, insipred by Vectronom and Titanfall 2 (the time travel stuff). Feel free to download the game and to give me some feedback on the Level Design. A playthrough will take 15 min max.

The game has yet no winning condition so after 3 levels it will restart automatically so make sure you party for yourself if you win.

Controls: Arrow Keys/WAD + Space, Controlls with Mouse such as walking backswards are not possible
